meanings.sent1: The urinose smell in the bathroom indicated a need for cleaning.
meanings.sent2: The urinose color of the liquid made it clear it was not safe to drink.
meanings.sent3: The urinose odor from the old socks was so strong it could wake up the neighbors.
meanings.sent4: The urinose hue of the sunset painted the sky in shades of gold and amber.
meanings.sent5: The urinose appearance of the stain on the carpet was a reminder to be more careful.

meanings.definition: Having the smell or color of urine.
meanings.sent1: The urinose cat litter needed to be changed regularly.
meanings.sent2: The urinose scent in the air made it hard to breathe.
meanings.sent3: The urinose color of the drink made everyone at the party laugh.
meanings.sent4: The urinose aroma of the flowers in the garden was surprisingly pleasant.
meanings.sent5: The urinose stain on the shirt was a clear sign of a clumsy eater.
